title: HackTheBox - Validation
content: Validation is an easy difficulty machine, where we have to exploit a SQL-injection vulnerability to get a foothold. Enumerating the system reveals, that only root can login to the machine. So we ch...

title: HackTheBox - Administrator
content: Administrator is a medium difficulty Windows machine that requires us to jump between multiple user accounts. After gaining access to a certain user account, we can execute a DC-sync attack to rece...

title: HackTheBox - Cap
tags: linux, easy, web-attacks, priv-esc, IDOR, python3
content: Cap is an easy Linux machine that requires us to abuse an IDOR vulnerability to gain credentials. After gaining a foothold we abuse a capability to escalate our privileges.

title: Guide: Interactive Shells
content: This guide explains what an interactive shell is and how you can get it running.

title: HackTheBox - Shocker
content: Shocker is an easy Linux machine that requires us to attack a website vulnerable to Shellshock (CVE-2014-6271). After gaining a foothold, we notice multiple ways to escalate our privileges.
